code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import rootReducer from"./reducer";import{RootSaga}from"./saga";import createSagaMiddleware from"redux-saga";var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var Store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware));sagaMiddleware.run(RootSaga);export default Store;
